thePizzaBakery.title: Quattro Stagioni Pizza
thePizzaBakery.description: Broccoli, artichoke, bell pepper, black olive, feta, mozzarella, micro greens. Experience authentic Italian flavours with our San Marzano tomato sauce & slow-fermented sourdough base, charred to perfection in a wood-fired oven!

thePizzaBakery.title: Popo's Veggie Delight Pizza
thePizzaBakery.description: Bell peppers, sun-dried tomato, black olive, zucchini, jalapeno, feta, micro greens, mozzarella. Experience authentic Italian flavours with our San Marzano tomato sauce & slow-fermented sourdough base, charred to perfection in a wood-fired oven!

thePizzaBakery.title: Italian Margherita Pizza
thePizzaBakery.description: Fior di latte mozzarella, san marzano tomato sauce & basil. Experience authentic Italian flavours with our slow-fermented sourdough base, charred to perfection in a wood-fired oven!

thePizzaBakery.title: Stuffed Garlic Bread with Sun-dried Tomatoes
thePizzaBakery.description: stuffed with a duet of caramelized onion & mozzarella. Topped with our juicy sun-dried tomatoes. Served with homemade garlic aioli. Chef recommends! *dip_contains_egg.

thePizzaBakery.title: Chicken Pizzaiola
thePizzaBakery.description: Grilled chicken, black olive, sun-dried tomatoes, red paprika, sriracha aioli, mozzarella, parmesan. Experience authentic Italian flavours with our San Marzano tomato sauce & slow-fermented sourdough base!

thePizzaBakery.title: Stuffed Garlic Bread with Chicken & Sun-dried Tomatoes
thePizzaBakery.description: stuffed with a duet of caramelized onion & mozzarella. Topped with roasted chicken & juicy sun-dried tomatoes!. Served with homemade garlic aioli.
